verbose_text: Recent reports show hypericin phototherapy can be enhanced by multi-fraction treatment, by the addition of synthetic oxygen carriers, or by co-administration of a cyclo-oxygenase inhibitor to block prostaglandin synthesis and prevent new angiogenesis in tumor sites [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: hypericin phototherapy can be enhanced by multi-fraction treatment, by the addition of synthetic oxygen carriers, or by co-administration of a cyclo-oxygenase inhibitor
